name: 20 by 20
description:
A simple strategy game where you need to make rows of 20. 

Blocks will continuously appear along the bottom.

Drag and drop them onto the board. 

Make a row of 20 to clear that row. 

When a block reaches the X, or you fill the board, you will lose a life. 

This game was created so I could test exporting to iOS and android. 

It was largely inspired by the gmtk gamejam entry 12 or 20 by TheDollarGameStore.

Music by Steven Melin

Sounds by Cafofo
